description: There's two chromium's on the software store. Is there a reason?
summary: I have a question, don't know if it's just me

description: Thanks for removing telemetry!

chromium is recommended for those who want a mix of some privacy, some functionality and some personalization by being able to log into a google account ect, 

ungoogled chromium is great for those who wouldnt mind sacifising the chrome store, being unable to log in a google account for an even more enhanced privacy than what the regular chromium offers
summary: great for anyone who are focused on privacy

description: hey rabbit i couldn't contact you in anyway so i'll just write the response as a review, the reason there are two chromiums is because one doesn't have google spying on you therefor better, ungoogled chromium is a great browser for developers who don't want google spying on them
The message is alarming so maybe it is better to run it without the --no-sandbox flag.
summary: unsupported falg --no-sandbox stability and security will suffer

description: Pages don't load half the time. It's slow to start and slow to work.
Its awesome, unlike the windows Chrome

this is Yasser from casablanca, the sofware is perfect, no telemetry, no any doubt about spyware, thanks for developers

>Note: u can download it in wds with these GitHub links:

> https://github.com/Eloston/ungoogled-chromium

> https://github.com/NeverDecaf/chromium-web-store (allows u to download extensiont on it)
I don't know why but I the login bottom just disappeared, I can't sync my bookmarks

The name "ungoogled" really removed google from chromium, the annoying google home page is now gone.
I like it.
It won't work, don't use it.

I guess I'll stick with the regular version since I have to log into my Google account for so many other services. But I was thinking privacy with the abilitiy to log into and out of Google account as needed might work?
summary: Can you still log into G-mail with this version?

description:
Hulu said, "We're having trouble playing this right now." It also didn't keep me logged in.

I got an error that said something like "Unsupported argument -- no sandbox."
summary: Doesn't seem to work for Hulu

description: I don't understand the 1 stars. What's the matter, "I don't get to sync my data"?
summary: Does what it says on the can

description: for an app that purports to cut the Google out of Chrome you sure do keep some of the worst parts. Guess what, that search tab feature no one likes that, no one uses that, it's just a way for google to spy on you. So why...for the like of Mike...did you keep it? Two starts until you smarten up and remove it
summary: Why keep the worst parts of Chrome

description: Takes around a minute launch- in this time I installed opera, opened opera and managed to do a web search.

"You are using an unsupported command-line flag: --no-sandbox. Stability and security will suffer."
Shows up every time I start the browser.
es una aplicacion muy buena aunque me dijieron que esta un poco desatualizada no hagan casos es una aplicacion muy buena la recomiendo y no es como firecfox que nesecita descargar el video para verlo

Es bueno el navegador, sin embargo si eres de los que utiliza el buscador de Google, este navegador no es para ti, asi mismo si buscas instalar extensiones de la chrome web store, pues tampoco se puede. Para eso existe la versión "normal de chromium"
summary: Sin el buscador de google, sin exenciones de la chrome web store

description:
c de la mrrd
je le conseil pas
Je cherche avec un mot clé et : L'adresse IP de ce server est introuvable.

Je ne donne jamais de commentaire, mais vu les commentaires précédent, je me donne mon avis. Les crétins qui installent ceci en croyant avoir google chrome, svp prenez la peine de lire avant d'installer. La plupart des fonctionnalités sont gardées mais sans l'intégration de google du coup c'est normal que quand tu tapes dans la barre d'adresse une recherche ça ne cherche pas. Sinon le navigateur fonctionne très bien voire même mieux que google chrome vu que c'est plus rapide. Très bon travail...

... mais n'oubliez pas d'aller dans paramètres pour choisir votre moteur de recherche par défaut (sinon vous n'aurez aucun résultat de recherche bien évidemment) et bien sûr vous pouvez utiliser google mais du coup pas grand intérêt à utiliser ce fork... Très rapide, même fonctionnalités que Chromium ou Google Chrome sans le pistage et profilage... à moins que vous n'utilisiez un compte Google (et donc aucun intérêt). Attention par défaut les cookies tiers sont bloqués (c'est mieux d'un certain point de vue) mais certains sites peuvent ne pas fonctionner correctement.
fantastic tout court
Chromium sans les googleries, la version entièrement délestée des suppléments de Google qu'on ne demande pas, et du coup plus légère que Chromium. Vraiment bien fait.
This application is simple, fast and lite. No use problem.
